config.-text: on COMPARE0A OC0A_isr                 'this is the sub to call on every interrupt
TCCR0A.WGM01=1                 'CTC mode (timer counts from 0 to OCR0A
TCCR0A |= (1<<WGM01);         // Set Timer0 to CTC mod

vector.-text: Timer 0 interrupt service routine - program comes here when Timer0 has reached the value in OCR0A
OC0A_isr:
return
ISR(TIMER0_COMPA_vect)            // signal handler for compareA interrupt OC0A

config.-text: 'range of Compare1a is 0 to 255, so in the program change the value at anytime to change the LED brightness
Config Timer1 = Pwm , Prescale = 64 , Pwm = 8 , Compare A Pwm = Clear Down , Compare B Pwm = disconnect

vector.-text: Timer 1 interrupt service routine - program comes here when Timer1 has overflowed
Tim1_isr:
return

timer.-text: M328 Timer0 @16MHz, PWM 8.16mS period on 0C0A portD.6
timer.name: M328 Timer0 @16MHz, PWM 8.16mS period on 0C0A portD.6

config.-text: 'Timer 0 (8bit) @16MHz Phase Correct PWM 8.16mS period on OC0A portD.6
TCCR0A.WGM00=1         ' Set Timer0 to Phase Correct PWM mode
TCCR0A |= (1<<WGM00);         // Set Timer0 to Phase Correct PWM mode

timer.-text: M328 Timer0 @16MHz, PWM 8.16mS period on 0C0B portD.5
timer.name: M328 Timer0 @16MHz, PWM 8.16mS period on 0C0B portD.5

config.-text: 'Timer 0 (8bit) @16MHz Phase Correct PWM 8.16mS period on OC0B portD.5
TCCR0A.WGM00=1         ' Set Timer0 to Phase Correct PWM mode
TCCR0A |= (1<<WGM00);         // Set Timer0 to Phase Correct PWM mode

timer.-text: M328 Timer1 @16MHz, 9Bit PWM, 0.511mS period on OC1A PortB.1 and OC1B portB.2
timer.name: M328 Timer1 @16MHz, 9Bit PWM, 0.511mS period on OC1A PortB.1 and OC1B portB.2

config.-text: 'Timer 0 (8bit) @16MHz Phase Correct PWM 8.16mS period on OC0B portD.5
TCCR1A.WGM00=1         ' Set Timer1 to 9bit Phase Correct PWM mode
TCCR1A.COM0A1=1         ' Connect Output Pin OC1A PortB.1
TCCR1A.COM0B1=1         ' Connect Output Pin OC1B PortB.2
TCCR1A |= (1<<WGM11);         // Set Timer1 to 9Bit Phase Correct PWM mode
TCCR1A |= (1<<COM1A1);         // Connect Output Pin OC1A PortB.1
TCCR1A |= (1<<COM1B1);         // Connect Output Pin OC1B PortB.2

timer.-text: M328 Timer2 @16MHz, PWM 1.02mS period on 0C2A portB.3 and OC2B PortD.3
timer.name: M328 Timer2 @16MHz, PWM 1.02mS period on 0C2A portB.3 and OC2B PortD.3

config.-text: 'Timer 2 (8bit) @16MHz Phase Correct PWM 1.02mS period on 0C2A portB.3 and OC2B PortD.3
TCCR0A.WGM20=1         ' Set Timer2 to Phase Correct PWM mode
TCCR0A |= (1<<WGM20);         // Set Timer2 to Phase Correct PWM mode

timer.name: M16 @1MHz Timer0 PWM 32.64mS Period - suitable for dimming an LED or LCD Backlight on OC0 (PortB.3)

config.-text: 'Timer 0 (8bit) @1MHz, Phase Correct PWM, 32 mS period on OC0(PortB.3)
'range of Compare0 is 0 to 255, so in the program change the value at anytime to change the LED brightness
OCR0 = 30     e.g. Compare Value of 30 gives 6.144mS pulsewidth
OCR0 = 30      //e.g. Compare Value of 30 gives 6.144mS pulsewidth
